content: Overall, we are pleased with the progress and results we have made towards the company's objectives, including consistent economic returns, a 10% economic return among peers for the second quarter, a 6% positive economic return in the last 12 months versus peers of negative 11%, 41% annualized total return from the MSR portfolio for the second quarter and 51% since inception, building out our SFR portfolio to our $200 million goal, a 10% total return in our credit portfolio during the second quarter through quite challenging market conditions and shifting the credit quality of the company's credit investment portfolio to nearly 60% senior AAA rated securities.
